From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2023 Indian drama film


YaatrisOfficial release posterDirected byHarish VyasWritten byAryan SahaProduced byKuku MohankaStarring
Raghubir Yadav
Seema Pahwa
Anuraag Malhan
Jamie Lever
Chahat Khanna
CinematographyFarukh MistryEdited byVikas AroraGaurangi VyasMusic bySaurabh Kalsi Bhuvan Ahuja Rohit SharmaProductioncompanyAkion EntertainmentRelease date
6 October 2023 (2023-10-06)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Yaatris (transl. Travellers) is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language Comedy drama film directed by Harish Vyas and written by Aryan Saha. It stars Raghubir Yadav, Seema Pahwa, Anuraag Malhan, Jamie Lever and Chahat Khanna.[1][2] The film was released on 6 October 2023.[3]


Synopsis[edit]
A dysfunctional middle-class family from Banaras, the Sharmas, embark on a life-changing adventure as they navigate love, humour, and life lessons in a touching story of community.[4][5]

Cast[edit]
Raghubir Yadav
Seema Pahwa
Anuraag Malhan
Jamie Lever
Chahat Khanna[6]

References[edit]


^ "'Yaatris' Actor Anuraag Malhan Recalls Crying In A Scene With Raghubir Yadav: Raghubir Sir Comforted Me Like My Own Father". Outlook. 27 September 2023. Retrieved 30 September 2023.

^ "Yaatris Trailer: बीच समंदर मुख्य कलाकारों को छोड़ आए निर्देशक, अनजान लोगों की मदद से फिर ऐसे पहुंचे किनारे". Amar Ujala. 26 September 2023. Retrieved 30 September 2023.

^ "Trailer of Raghubir Yadav and Seema Pahwa starrer Yaatris out". Cinema Express. 27 September 2023. Retrieved 30 September 2023.

^ "रिश्तों की खट्टी मीठी नोक-झोंक है 'YAATRIS', दिल छू लेने वाली कहानी, ट्रेलर देख लोग बोले- रिलीज का इंतजार". News18 Hindi. 25 September 2023. Retrieved 30 September 2023.

^ "Raghubir Yadav and Seema Pahwa starrer Yaatris is a heart-warming tale of Family, Emotions, and Adventure". The Times of India. 26 September 2023. Retrieved 30 September 2023.

^ "Chahatt Khanna Misses Jamming With Raghubir Yadav On 'Yaatris' Sets". Outlook. Retrieved 30 September 2023.
